SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.system.linux

Class XGenericEventCookie

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.system.linux.XGenericEventCookie
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class XGenericEventCookie extends Struct implements NativeResource
Additional information for an XGenericEvent.

Layout


 struct XGenericEventCookie {
     int type();
     unsigned long serial();
     Bool send_event();
     Display * display();
     int extension();
     int evtype();
     unsigned int cookie;
     void * data;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • XGenericEventCookie

      public XGenericEventCookie(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a XGenericEventCookie instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
